InsPlcyLimit.name: InsPlcyLimit
InsPlcyLimit.description: Represents the data that's used as a base to track the insurance policy consumption.

Amount.description: The currency amount for the insurance policy or coverage attributes.

AssociatedAttributeId.description: The insurance policy attribute or insurance policy coverage attribute that's associated with the insurance policy limit.

InsurancePlcyLmtCode.description: The unique code of the insurance policy limits across all policy versions.

InsurancePolicyAssetId.description: The insurance policy asset that's associated with the insurance policy limit.

InsurancePolicyCoverageId.description: The insurance policy coverage that's associated with the insurance policy limit.

InsuredPolicyParticipantId.description: The insurance policy participant that's associated with the insurance policy limit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the insurance policy limit record.

PolicyVersionId.description: The insurance policy version that's associated with the insurance policy limit.

ProdtAttrMappedScopeId.description: The product attribute mapped scope that's associated with the insurance policy limit.

Value.description: The count for the insurance policy or coverage attributes.
